member.name: T:GrpcDotNetNamedPipes.NamedPipeCallContext
member.summary:
A subclass of ServerCallContext for calls to a NamedPipeServer.
You only need to use this class in order to call RunAsClient for impersonation. The client needs to set NamedPipeChannelOptions.ImpersonationLevel for this to work.

member.name: M:GrpcDotNetNamedPipes.NamedPipeCallContext.RunAsClient(System.IO.Pipes.PipeStreamImpersonationWorker)
member.summary:
Calls a delegate while impersonating the client.
The client needs to set NamedPipeChannelOptions.ImpersonationLevel for this to work.

member.name: P:GrpcDotNetNamedPipes.NamedPipeChannelOptions.CurrentUserOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the client pipe can only connect to a server created by the same user.

member.name: P:GrpcDotNetNamedPipes.NamedPipeChannelOptions.ImpersonationLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the security impersonation level.

member.name: P:GrpcDotNetNamedPipes.NamedPipeChannelOptions.ConnectionTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.

member.name: P:GrpcDotNetNamedPipes.NamedPipeServerOptions.CurrentUserOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the server pipe can only be connected to a client created by the same user.

member.name: P:GrpcDotNetNamedPipes.NamedPipeServerOptions.PipeSecurity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the access control to be used for the pipe.

member.name: T:GrpcDotNetNamedPipes.Generated.TransportReflection
member.summary: Holder for reflection information generated from Internal/transport.proto

member.name: T:GrpcDotNetNamedPipes.Generated.TransportMessage.DataOneofCase
member.summary: Enum of possible cases for the "data" oneof.

member.name: P:GrpcDotNetNamedPipes.Generated.PayloadInfo.InSamePacket
member.summary: For small packets, the payload bytes immediately follow the TransportMessage proto in the same packet. For large packets, the payload bytes are in a separate packet to avoid extra copying.

member.name: T:GrpcDotNetNamedPipes.Generated.MetadataEntry.ValueOneofCase
member.summary: Enum of possible cases for the "value" oneof.
